title: HDFHLIP21464V022021
sample_text:
10 
Section B. Benefits 
If the Insured Person is diagnosed as suffering from a Critical Illness during the Policy Period, then We will 
pay the Sum Insured as a lump sum, provided that: 
i) 
The Critical Illness, which the Insured Person is suffering from,occurs or manifests itself during 
the Policy Period as a first incidence, and 
ii) 
The Insured Person survives for at least 30/15 days as opted and mentioned on the Policy Schedule 
following such diagnosis. 
 
Section C. Exclusions 
I. 
Specific Exclusions 
We will not make any payment for any claim in respect of the Insured Person caused
